summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 86th Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to approximately 230 feet west thereof; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14883 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
